org.milyn.smooks.camel.converters

Class SourceConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.milyn.smooks.camel.converters.SourceConverter

  • @Converter
public class SourceConverter
extends Object
    SourceConverter is a Camel Converter that converts from different formats to Source instances.

    Author:
    Daniel Bevenius
